heading: Computer Laptop and Desktop
text: All company Laptops, Desktops, Monitors, Printers, Scanners, Networking Devices, External Devices & Data Storage, Memory & Motherboards etc.

text: All company Surveillance Cameras, Spy Cameras, Dome Cameras, Bullet Camera, Simulated Cameras, Video Cameras, Indoor Cameras & Accessories etc.

heading: Household Scrap
text:
All Electronics appliances, Electronics & Electrical Scrap, Battery Recycling,
